answers.answer: Yay!! Congrats Kittyface!!
This kind of news is always good to hear for those of us still TXing. Helps us through the rough patches. Best to you.
Congratulations, Kitty!!!!  Another win for our team!
great news, bet you loved those results!!Denise
congrats!peacerita
Congratulations, you DID it!jd
Congratulations. You did it and you did it even with adjustments to your meds and uncontrolled diabetes.Fantastic!All the best and thanks for brightening up my day.port

'Purrfectly' wonderful to hear such great news, congratulations!  :)I'm so thrilled for you!And thanks for posting, because it gives so much encouragement.. my husband's doing the Alinia+SOC (week 26), so it's very exciting to hear success stories.  Celebrate your new SVR life!~eureka
Congratulations     SVR  all the way......
Great news!Now you can change your name from kittyface to happyface....Magnum
If kittycats wear red heels too, its time.Congrats kittyfaceapache
Balloons over Texas to you! Good deal, it sounds like you’ve made it--Bill
The last stab at the dragon! Congratulations. Take a well earned rest and think positive!Brent
YOU GO GIRL!! NOW THAT"S WHAT I"M TALKIN" "BOUT!!! Your Alinia buddy jerry
Congratulations!
It's almost time for the red stilettos!!! A huge congratulations, you must be overjoyed!
Big cngrats - fantastic news!!!!! Onward with the rest of your life :-)
I can hear you purring all the way to Sweden!Big congrats!!!ca
Congratulations on your news!Be well,Mike
Thats fantastic! I remember you started with a VERY high viral load like me.I wish you SVR and the very very best of luck on your good news.Charm

question: I was on SOC plus Alinia.  Reduced IFN and Riba for a few months due to low Hgb.  Also have uncontrolled diabetes but I'm still UND!!  Must be the Alinia!!  Test was <5.SVR to all!A very happy Kittyface
title: UNDETECTED -- 3 months post tx - Yippeee!
